Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I have a suggestion that Squad should try and put into the game. In career mode, you can finish the tech tree and not even leave the Kerbin SOI, Which bothers me.

My suggestion:

Add a tech tree component for every planet/SOI area.

Example:

Once you go to Duna you can get science for the Duna system and planet that might give you [iNSERT PARTS HERE]

This will make Science collection make you spread out of the Kerbin's SOI and into the other amazing planets/moons that KSP has to offer.

Hope you like this idea and it gets put into the game!

While I agree that there should be some impetus in career mode to travelling to other planets, I don't think this is gonna be the way it should/is gonna happen. The way I understand it, the contracts and reputation systems that are being added will be what forces the player out of Kerbins SOI.

Would be good IMO however, if the cost of tech increases faster as you fill out the tree.
